# depthUsage

**Instance Property**

The texture usage value to apply to the layer’s depth textures.

## Declaration

```swift
var depthUsage: MTLTextureUsage { get set }
```

## Discussion

Metal optimizes texture-related operations based on the value in this property. The usage value can be a combination of options. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureUsage].

## Configuring the depth information

- **depthFormat**: The pixel format to use for the layer’s depth textures.
- **defaultDepthRange**: The distances to the far and near clipping planes that define the bounds of your content.
